thread.title: Priyanka Chopra's former secretary, Prakash Jaju is back, trashes the actress on Twitter
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra's former secretary, Prakash Jaju is back, trashes the actress on Twitter

author: Deccan
title: Priyanka Chopra's former secretary, Prakash Jaju is back, trashes the actress on Twitter
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 19, 2015, 14.36 pm Mumbai: Priyanka Chopra’s ex-secretary, who tormented her with outrageous accusations after the actress terminated his contract with him in year 2004, is back.
Prakash, who had been out of sight for a long time, is now back on his social media account with a lot of accusations. Prakash has openly accused PeeCee and her family and he is in no mood of burying the hatchet.
Things turned sour between Priyanka and her then manager, Prakash, when she suddenly terminated his services. Prakash filed a criminal suit against the actress in Andheri court, Mumbai.
It all started when Prakash accused Priyanka of not clearing his dues and her father for the whole incident. Things turned worse when Prakash blamed Priyanka for having Chhota Shakeel threaten him through phone calls on behalf of her.
In 2008, Priyanka’s father went to Police and filed a complaint against Prakash for interfering in his daughter’s privacy. Prakash ended up serving 67 days in jail.
After Prakash got out of jail, he met Priyanka’s ex-boyfriend Aseem Merchant. The two decided to make a film together titled as ’67 Days’, which was a biopic on Prakash.
Soon enough, Priyanka noticed that the film’s promotions revolved around her and sent Aseem a legal notice and the film was dashed.
